__e: You're a big bastard! A big bleeding' bastard!
It's because of you, you bastard, because of you...
That's too fine a collar for a mongrel like you.
Is the bastard dead or not?
You see, two dogs from Hong Kong have contracted a rare... and highly contagious disease.
The bastard's born before the master's son!
I'd love to see the clever bastard who was here before.
If he is an upstart bastard like this, it's worse.
For the sake of the one poor bastard who didn't do it.
We have come to take him.
That bastard has had everything in life.
